author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO WEAKENING AND EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY LATE SUNDAY...
summary: ...IVO WEAKENING AND EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY LATE SUNDAY... As of 2:00 PM MST Sat Aug 09 the center of Ivo was located near 21.0, -113.5 with movement W at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO WEAKENING AND EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY LATE SUNDAY... As of 2:00 PM MST Sat Aug 09 the center of Ivo was located near 21.0, -113.5 with movement W at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
